2027410.name: Neuropathic Demo
2027410.description:
[Demo contains the first 4 hours of the game.]

Neuropathic is the story of a love-sick teenager taking an introspective journey through her own headspace. Join Tracy on a merry and traumatizing adventure to fix her heart - or whatever Love tells you to do, really.

Features

  • + Dozens of unique characters based on your emotions - each with their own developing dialogue trees, relationships and roles in the story.
  • + Humour both charmingly cute and delightfully dark.
  • + Fast-paced Top-down Hack-and-slash combat with a variety of enemies.
  • + Emotional storytelling with open-ended exploration and secrets.
  • + Spooky Ladies
  • + Love
  • - Love?
2027410.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
